meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Janel Stogdill Mike Nickel Rani Peffer Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #6717.

td.p: Janel Stogdill, a homeschool mom from Valrico, Florida
Mike Nickel, a social worker from St. Louis, Missouri
Rani Peffer, a corporate finance manager from Crittenden, Kentucky (whose 5-day cash winnings total $68,701)

tr.td: LITERATURA EN ESPAÑOL
(Alex: You have to give us the English words.)
DOOHICKEYS
TOMB SERVICE
FOOD WORDS CREATED IN THE AMERICAS
OUT OF WHAT?
(Laura Osnes: It's the magic of...)
